DOC.detailed_description: Subjects demonstrate successful allergen response common allergen receive first study treatment use instructed 5 day , enter Environmental Exposure Chamber ( EEC ) 3-hour exposure know concentration allergen . After wait least 7 day , subject receive second study treatment use instructed 5 day , 3-hour Conjunctival Allergen Provocation Test ( CAPT ) perform escalate concentration allergen . Subjects dose study treatment approximately 15 minute prior allergen provocation test .
DOC.criteria: History allergic conjunctivitis ; Active sign symptom ocular allergy ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . History dry eye ; Presence ocular infection ; Presence severe serious ocular condition ; Symptoms allergic conjunctivitis ; Use topical systemic ocular medication specify protocol ; Ocular surgery laser surgery within 6 month study start ; Unwilling discontinue contact lens wear 72 hour prior Visit 1 study period ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
